prompt_base: hyperdetailed portrait of a tall, muscular man, completely bald head, three functional eyes clearly visible on forehead, realistic human skin texture, green martial arts gi vest, wide jawline, determined expression
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, cinematic dramatic lighting, detailed skin wrinkles and pores, sharp focus on the third eye structure, detailed fabric texture on vest
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, two eyes only, missing eye, blurry eyes, smooth skin, low quality, deformed face, simple shading
